sections.summary:
Enthusiastic Chemist eager to pursue a lasting career in the Agriculture industry.
Detail-oriented Chemist with expertise in the instrumentation, physical and wet chemistry, and formulation as well as coordinating testing and
development.
Highlights
HPLC
UV-Vis
GC
Physical Chemistry techniques
FTIR
GMP/GCP
Accomplishments
Led the pre-formulation and formulation development of a topical cream and gel for psoriases which successfully entered clinical trials.
